text: In Evil Hour is a novel written by Colombian Nobel Prize-winning author Gabriel García Márquez. It was published in 1972. It was published in English in 1979. Márquez lived in Paris at the time and was about to title this book This Town of Shit or This Shitty Town.In Evil Hour by Gabriel García Márquez ==References== Category:1972 books Category:Books by Gabriel García Márquez
title: In Evil Hour
